string.value: #b#p2081300##k told me to see #b#p2081000##k in Leafre to get #b#t4031343##k and #b#t4031344##k.

#b#p2081000##k told me to bring #b#t4031348##k to get #b#t4031343##k and #b#t4031344##k. He/She says the merchants in another town have the secret magic book. \r\n#i4031348##t4031348##k #b#c4031348#/1
I heard about you from 4th Job Instructor in the Forest of the Priest. You're trying for the 4th job advancement.
You're looking for #b#t4031343##k and #b#t4031344##k. If you can do one thing for our town, I'll give them to you. Can you prove you're a hero?

This forest and the dragons that inhabit it protect herrings, which protect the eggs of the dragons who protect the forest. But we think we need to protect ourselves. They're fairly dangerous. I've also heard of a mighty dragon known as Horntail, somewhere outside of town. His power is said to be unrivaled..

At any rate, I heard that those merchants who sell order sheets in the other town sell #b#t4031348##k, which can help the owner of the sheet. We might as well protect our town and Minar Forest with the order sheet.
Can you get me the order sheet for our town? \r\nThen I'll give you what you're looking for.
It's ok not to accept my suggestion. You can get what you want a different way.
Thank you for your kindness. This document will be a great help for our town. \rYou have the heart of a true hero.
